J. Herbert Cope cu November 21, 1882 ni ah a chuak. 1904 kum ah University of Pennsylvania in B.Sc degree a lak. 1908 ah Rochester Theological Seminary in Bachelor of Divinity a dih. July 7, 1908 ni ah Pathian rianttuantu si ding in chitithuh a si. September 7, 1908 ni ah Elizabeth Smith he an i um. Burma ah mission rian ttuan ding in September 30, 1908 ni ah tilong in an chuak. Hakha khua cu December 21, 1908 ni ah an phan. J. Herbert Cope nih cun Hakha holh kha a cawn i a thiam ngai. Lai holh phun thum, Hakha, Falam le Tidim holh kha a thiam. Tidim holh in Bible Biakam Thar le Hla cauk kha 1936 kum ah a chuah. Cauk fa tete 35 tluk kha sianginn cawn ding ah Laiholh a phunphun in a ttial. 1924 kum ah Lairam bawi nawlngeitu nih Rev. Cope cu sianginn chektu ah a hman. Cozah nih rianttuannak caah hlawh an pe lo. A khualtlawnnak caah kum khat ah rupee 700 long an pek.
1935 kum ah Colgate University nih upatnak ah doctor degree kha an pek. A rianttuan ruangah British cozah nih Kaiser-1-Hind Medal an pek. Rev. Cope le a innchungkhar cu Tidim ah a um mi an si. Rev. Cope cu Lakher Pioneer Mission of India conference a kal pah ah June 11, 1938 ah a thi i Hakha khua ah a ruak an vui. Elizabeth Cope cu July 1938 thla ah Burma in a chuak i an ram ah a kir tthan. December 10, 1968 ni ah Philadelphia khua ah a thi.

Ramleng chuahnak dingah Passport a herh.Passport sernak dingah ID (မှတ်ပုံတင်) le Chungkhar cazin (အိမ်ထောင်စုစာရင်း) a hau.
Mah cu Cozah sinah ser dih a si. Mah kan va sernak kha kan Cozah cu an si. SAC minung pawl sin i kan i ser ahcun MAH kha kan cohlan a si. Ralhrang pawl kha cozah ah pom ( (အသိမှတ်ပြု) khi a si. A si ahcun a tu Hakha passport zung hmai i aa tlarmi khi SAC a duh tu nan si tinak a si.

Cun phungchim hlan deuh ah tarpa nih solo a kan sak piak lai tiah caantlai nih a thiah. Tarpa cu a hun dir a catlap aa chuah cun thangnawn in Pathian thang ṭhatnak hla cu a sak. Tarpa hi a hna a chet, a mit a hmu tuk ti lo caah a mithman cu a hun remh I catlam cu a bihpah, a hmuh zokzok lo caah a h
... (235 chars skipped) ...
nutung pahnih thum an mitthli an i hnawh len mi ka hei hmuh hna. Tarpa hlasak hi a aw a ṭha lo, a hla hi ngaih nuam ngai zonga si lem lo, sihmanhsehlaw a nun in Pathian a thangṭhat ti cu al awk a ṭha lo. Nun in a hung luangmi thang ṭhatnak hla hna nih mi thinlungah rian a ṭuan tawn.

Industry Minister Pu H. Rohluna chuan M/s Mizo Carbon Products Pvt. Ltd. chu Industry department in show cause notice a pe mek tih sawiin, an permit an renew loh avangin explantion an call mek tih a sawi bawk.
Nimin a Assembly Budget Session zawhna leh chhanna hunah MNF member, Aizawl West-II bialtu MLA, Pu Lalruatkima zawhna chhanga he thu hi sawiin, Industry Minister Pu H. Rohluna chuan, Industrial Growth Centre Luangmual a Mizo Carbon Products Pvt. Ltd chu kum 1 atan ram pek an nih thu leh kumtin renew zel tur a nih thu a sawi a, Mizo Carbon hi ni 14.2.2012-a Commission a nih thu leh Installed Capacity chu MT 24200 p.a a nih thu a sawi bawk. Industry Minister chuan M/S Mizo Carbon Products Pvt. Ltd. chungchang ah hian Industries department chuan hma ala tih sawiin, show cause notice pawh pek an nih tawh thu leh hei hi an chhan tawh leh tawh loh a hriat mai loh thu a sawi bawk. M/s Mizo Carbon Products Pvt. Ltd. hi Central Capital Investment subsidy leh Central Transport Subsidy cheng nuai tam tak la chunga hnathawh hmuh tur awm silo ah puh an ni.

Myanmar ram chhungah Military Council ten dan lova sorkarna an pawng lak hnu hian mipui 1833 an that tawh a, mi 13644 an man tawh thu Political prison, AAPP chuan an thuchhuah an tar lang,
He list an lak khawm hi kum 2021 February 1 atangin kumin 2022 May 10, thlenga chhinchhiah dan a ni a, hre chiang thei ila hei ai hian an tam hle ang tiin an tar lang.
Spring Revoltion huna vawiin thleng hian mi 10593 man tawh niin mi 1048 Jail tantir an ni. Case awrhtir zingah kum 18 tling lo, naupang 2 tiamin mi 68 thi tura an chungthu rel a ni. Man tura tih (Warrant) 1977 zingah thi tura an chungthu rel mi109 an awm.
Heng bakah hian sorkarna an lak atanga kumin 2022 April thla thleng a, Military Council ten mipui chenna in an kalhsak tawh zawng zawng hi 570 aia tlem lo a nih thu AAPP chuan a tar lang.

NSS thisen pek hun hmanpui
Pachhunga University College-a National Service Scheme (NSS) te chuan kum 50 an tlin lawmna pualin nimin khan PUC Campus-a thisen pek runpui an buatsaih a, he hun hi Health Minister Dr. R. Lalthangliana chuan hmanpuiin thisen pe tura hriselna tha neih a ngaih avangin zirlai kalkhawmte chu an taksa vawng uluk turin a chah a. Hriselna atana ke a kal uar a pawimawh thu a sawi bawk. PUC hian Mizoram-a zirna In zinga kum khat chhunga thisen pe tam ber dinhmun luah mekin kumin hian Unit 521 an pe tawh a, Unit 1100 pek tlin an tum a ni.

By: Victor Zika
Tuna khawvel hmun hrang hrangin ropui leh ursun taka kan hman'Nu-te Ni' Mother's Day lo piang chhuak thei tura thih thlenga rinawm taka thawktu "Nu-te Ni Bultantu" (Founder of Mother's Day) chu Anna Jarvis a ni. Anna Jarvis-i hi a nu Ann Marie Reeves Jarvis-i hian May 9, 1905 hian a boralsan ta a. (Ann Marie Reeves Jarvis hi Nu-te Ni lo piangchhuak tura duhthu lo sam thintu leh lo piang chhuak thei tura a taka thahnemngai taka lo thawktu pawh a ni. A dam lai hian mirethei chanhai tamtak a tanpui a, damlo mangang tamtak a tanpui bawk a, a hmeichhe pui mi tamtak hnenah thlaichin dan leh thingkung phun dan vel pawh a zirtir thin a ni. Chutih laia USA a la awm ngai lo Tomatoes chin dan leh enkawl dan pawh a zirtir a ni) Anna Jarvis-i leh a nau Elsionre-i chu an innghahna leh an rinpui ber a nu in a boralsan tak avangin, lungngai leh beidawng em em in an hringnun chu an hmachhawn tan ta a ni. 1907 (A nu thih hnu kum hnih hnu) ah Anna Jarvis chuan "Nu-te Ni" (Mother's Day) a lo pianchhuah theihnan a dam chhung zawng tanla turin thutlukna a siam fel ta a ni. Tichuan Anna Jarvis chuan thian tamtak siam in, an ram thuneitute leh mi liante hnenah "Nu-te Ni" (Mother's Day) hmang turin dilna lehkha an thawn thin a ni.

City Hunter| 2018 April 17| Myanmar ram cozah riantuantu thlahlawh karh an si lai i cozah riantuantu umnak inn (quarter) zong sakpiak chap an si lai tiah Myanmar President U Win Myint nih April 17 ah a chim.
Thlenremhnak a khulnuarmi zung pawl felfai deuh in zoh le renghnak ah ramkomh cozah nih a chiahmi thanchonak policy cu zungkip nih papek a dotdot in an tuanchuah lai tiah President U Win Myint nih April 17, kumthar biarocah (new year- speech) ah a chim.
Cozah riantuantu pakhat i a niambik th
... (646 chars skipped) ... 
ua a sami mizapi harnak pawl tuarpinak caah mizapi ca riantuantu le atu lio cozah riantuan chung ah quarter ngeih lo ruang i harnak tongmi an um bantuk in pension laak dih hnu ah umnak inn ngeih lo ruang i harnak a tongmi cozah riantuantu tampi an um. Cu ruang ah cozah bu nih cozah riantuantu pawl, pension an laak tikah anmah bingte (private) in inn an ngeih ding, taih-khaan an ngeih ding le limhang ngeite in khua an sak khawhnak caah quarter pawl hi papek in kan tawlrelpiak hna lai tiah Preside

h riantuantu hna nun lamthluan a tluannak ding ah caantawi chung ca budget zong riantuantu hna caah sullam le hmual a ngeimi si ding zong a si khawh chung in tawlrelpiak kan i zuam lai.
Ramchung ah rian tampi hmuh khawhnak ding ah chawphumnak a tuahtu ding ramleng pawl kan sawm hna lai. Ramleng phan Myanmar rammi riantuantu hna runvennak, cozah hmuh khawhnak hna zong ramhnih hnatlaknak pawl hrambunh in fak deuh in kan tawlrel lai tiah biarocah ahcun a chimchih.

Biathlam ah kan hmuhmi cu Pathian nih atu kan vawlei hi ka hrawh lai i van le vawlei `har ka ser lai, a ti. Cutikah cun khamhnak a hmumi minung he i hawikomhnak thar ka ser lai, a ti. Minung Nunnak A Sullam Hi Zei Dah A Si?

Myanmar ramsung buainak ah mino ṭhaṭha cu ramlak ah an lut ih meithal kengin thuneihnak latu ralkap pawl an do rero lai. Mipi in an bank account ihsin sumpai an kuat ṭheu ih bawmnak an pe. Cuvek lakah ralkap pawl khal an rak cangvai ve ih PDF pawl ih bank account cu phitsak dan ding an tawlrel.
Aung Myint timi facebook neitu hi zo a si ti cu theih a si lo, ralkap maw a si ding, ralkap lamtang dalan ti cu theih a si lo. Chaung U-PDF pawl hnenah “Sumpai ka hlu duh” tin sumpai hlunak ding bank account a sut.
Chaung U-PDF khalin bank account an rak sim ih Ks.1000 a hlu thu a sim thei, cumi hnu nazi pakhat ah cumi bank account cu a thi hngal. Aung Myint in PDF pawl bum ngah ah a ruat’aw man ding nan PDF pawlin an rak bum ngah sawn.
PDF in thilthleng ding an theihcia ruangah an hman ṭheumi bank account cu an pe lo ih amai hmang ding lawngah sumpai kuatnak pakhat an tuahcop ih an pek thu pawl an sim thei. Chaung U-PDF in hivek thil a thleng leh ding ti an rak theihcia ruangah ziangkim ah fimkhur zetin an cangvai thu pawl an tarlang.
Sumpai thawhtu zaten an cohlang lo thu khal an tarlang ih an cohlang hlanah zingzoinak nasa zet an neicia ṭheu. Thusutnak phunphun paltlangtu mipi pawl hnen khalah lungawithu an sim ṭheu ih mipi sumpai 50/100 ihsin thokin an kilhim ringring thu pawl theihternak an tuah.

USA, Georgia pan Pa Do Thawn Mang (Sezang, Malneu beh) in hongnusia
Mangpha Pa Do Thawn Mang (Kum 54) Malneu Beh: Sezang Khuami Tedim lawibual veng a akhang khia Richmond Hill, Georgia aa ateng Pa Do Thawn Mang in abeisa January 21,2021 in Sin natna tawh hongnusia chih thu izak man in ZIUSA kipawlna mintawh dahpihna i pulak hi.
Pa Mang pen Pasian lamhon sakna tawh April 2014 USA atung ahihi, ZIUSA Genvai member honglut ni 8/01/2014 pan active member khat ahih manin thumeilet bylaw zuiin (100%) Death Benefit $15000 kipiakhia dinga paakkual $150 man khattawh zong mangpha khakna kinei ding hi.
Pa Mang luanghawm tawh anunungpen hunzatkhop ding hong tungding Saturday January 30,2021 in (RC) Pawlpi makaihna tawh Funeral Service bawl khit ciang, Father Kim Pu leh Father Lian in vuina nei ding hi.
Pa Mang hong nusiatna hang adahakap alungleng khuangai tanau meltheih khem peuh hehnemsiampa Kha Siangtho in alamdangin hong hehnem ciatta hen! Dahpihna Lianpitawh, Mun Mang (Genvai tanupi – Zomi Innkuan USA, Inc. Secretary of Genvai)

Information & Public Relation Department leh Mizoram Film Forum-in Reiek bul, Ailawng khaw daia Film City hmuna filma channa tur Zokhaw lem an dina Di In an sak zawng zawng chu nimin khan a kang ral.
Ailawng VCP Lalthla-muana sawi danin Zokhua hi nimin chhun dar 12 vel khan a kâng a, kangmei chhuah chhan hi tun dinhmunah hriat a ni rihlo a ni. Helai hmun hi hrileng avanga khar ṭhin a ni chung pawhin mi ṭhenkhat gate tichhia a lut mai an awm fo tih a a sawi a, Ailawng khawtlang pawl hrang hrang hruaituten Zokhua kangral mai chu an ui takzet tih a sawi bawk.
Mizoram Film Forum Chairman chuan he thil thleng chungchangah hian Kulikawn Police Station-ah FIR a thehlut a ni.
Kum 2019 a sak ṭan Ailawng Zokhua-ah hian Mizo in hrang hrang 16 a awm a, nikum kum bul lam atanga Covid 19 hrileng avangin hawn theiha peih fel a nih hnuah pawh hawn mai theih a ni lova, hrilengin ziaawm lam a pan tak avangin tun hnaiah hawn thuai tura ruahmanna kalpui mek a nih laiin a kang fai ta vek a, kangmei hi Lal in aṭanga chhuak ṭanin, inhnaih tetea sak a nih avangin hun reilote chhungin a kang fai vek a ni.

Pauk Peng Ah SAC Ralkap Hriamngan Kuan Nih Kum 6 Ngakchia A Khen Caah A Nunnak Liam+Ralkap Nih Ngakchia Pahnih An Kaa Chungah Meithal An Hrolh Hna I An Kah Thah Hna Magway ramṭhen, Pauk peng Kyiapitkan(ကျားပစ်ကန်) khua ah SAC ralkap cu nizan July 27 ah an lut i, hriamngan in an kah caah kum tling lo ngakchia kum 6 Thein Thein Phyo cu hriamngan kuan nih a khen caah a nunnak liam, tiah tualchung mi hna nih an chim.

... (77 chars skipped) ... 
ein Thein Phyo cu hriamngan nih a khen caah a nunnak liam.
“Uico ralkap pawl nih hriamngan an kah caah Kyiapitkan khua inn pakhat cungah a tlak caah kum 6 ngakchia nu a nunnak liam. Cu hnu ah khua cu mei in an khangh. Uico ralkap nih hriamngan an kah ruangah khua mi ngakchia he upa he hliamhma an pu,” tiah tualchung mi pakhat nih a chim.
Magway ramṭhen, Myaing peng Kyauksauk(ကျောက်ဆောက်) khua ah kum tling lo ngakchia kum 16, La Min Maung Maung le Moe Yan Htet hna cu July 27 ah SAC ralkap nih an 
... (77 chars skipped) ...
na nih an chim.
“An kaa chungah meithal piang an hrolh hna hnuah an kah thah hna. An ruak cu mei in an khangh hna. Cu cu khua mi pakhat nih aa thupnak in a hmuh hna. Ralkap nih siangngakchia pawl cu PDF an si tiah an ti hna i an thah hna,” tiah Kyauksauk khua mi pakhat nih Khit Thit Media ah a chim.
Nihin July 28 zinglei tiang ah SAC ralkap nih Magway le Sagaing ramṭhen ah kahdohnak a um lo nain inn le lo an khangh i, hriamngan in an kah hna, tiah theih a si. Credit : The Chin Post

Myanmar hlasakthiam lar Benjamin Sum, Mizoram hlasakthiam lar Vanlalsailoa le India milar Jeje pawl cu Charity Show hrang hmunkhat ah caan an hmang tlang. Caan an hmantlangnak san bik cu Mizoram TV Channel picang pahnih Zonet le LPS tuantlang in Charity Show an tuah dingmi hrang timtuahnak le thehlarnak hrang a si.
Nuamtol ih umkhawm men an silo ih,harsa bawmnak ding hrang theitawk tansuah in caan an hmangtlang. Tuitum ih an hlasakmi cu an umkhawm caan ih an sak duak menmi a si hrih. An lakah midang lar tambik khal an um. An zate harsa bawmnak hrang timtuahnak nei an si.
Hlasakthiam Benjamin Sum cu a nu’i harhdamnak thu ah Mizoram ih umhrih a si ih, Mizoram mipi pawl in thazang an rak pe thiam lawlaw. Hlasakthiam an ti tlunah a nuncan le umdan cu an uar in an duh tuk ih, a cangvaihnak ziangkim cu zohnuam ,thlir nuam an tituk. Pathian a tihzahnak khal mipi in an uar phah tukih,a nun ah zir ding a tam tiah amah uartu pawl cun an rel. Mizoram a umsung ah Myanmar raltlan hrang ting 60 lenglo le Chinmi raltlan hrang sumpai tamtuk a rak pe rero zo.

Nimin khan, District Child Protection Committee chuan an Chairperson Maria C.T Zuali, District Bawrhsap hovin Champhai Zotea Observation Home sak mek bakah, District Child Protection Office leh Rose Children’s Home hmun turte tlawhin an enfiah.
Bawrhsap hi Juvenile Justice Board Principal Magistrate Zosangzeli Tlau leh member dang te, District Child Protection Committee member te, Child Welfare Committe Chairman leh District Child Protection Service-a thawk ten an tawiawm a ni. Champhai Zotea Observation Home sak mek chu siamthat ngaite sawiho niin, duhthusam lohna leh a nih dan tur phak lohna awmte chu sawrkar thuneitu sang zawka thlen ni se, an ti a ni.
Observation Home bik hi kum tlinglo dan bawhchhiate dahna tur a ni a, mahse building sak danah erawh Observation Home tur anga ruahman a ni lo a. Mipa leh hmeichhia awmna tur pawh a hranpa a siam a nih loh bakah building sak a nih tur thu hi Champhai District lama thuneitute hrilh hriat an ni lo nia thudawn a ni.
Nimin vek khan Champhai Zotea District Child Protection Office leh Rose Children’s Home hmunhma turte pawh khawtlang hruaitute nen tlawha enfiah nghal a ni bawk.

By: Shri M. Laikaw
CEM, MADC, Siaha.
Mizoram Board of School Education (MBSE) ta High School Leaving Certificate (HSLC) Examination Result 2023 a vaw papuapa liata Marapasaw su nano nanopa tawhta nata Siaha District tawhta hlaotlohna pha kawpa a vaw topa zydua chô liata ei châ lykhei hmeiseih ei.
A pachaipa ta eima Marapasaw hry tawhta Top-7 liata Ls. Isabel Daoki, D/o Prof. Dr. K. Robin â vaw hlao theipa he a rônah tah na ta, ei palaikhei ngâsâ.
School nano nanopa liata pachutuhpazy nama raihriana theilâ pha kawpa hmô thei awpa ta Marapasaw nata Siaha District ta eima topa he hmahsiena a châ tah lei thei va na.
Hlaotlohna phapa a vaw hneipa zydua, he result phapa lia he ta â daih tah thlâh leipa ta, hmialâ daihti châta tiama papua via lymâpa ta achuna sâh viapa pazao lymâ awpa ta ei cha hrua ei.
Hlaotlohna a to mâh leipazy chhao, thachhie leipa ta nata hnôhsy leipa ta tiama papua via lymâ awpa ta khokheina sâh chaipa ei cha hlei ei.
Sd/- M. LAIKAW
Chief Executive Member
Mara Autonomous District Council
Siaha.

QC-a awm te Vote thlak dan tur ngaihtuah
Naktuk-a Village Council inthlanpui nei turah Quarantine Centre-a awm ten Postal Ballot hmanga Vote an thlak theih nan State Election Commission hnenah rawtna thlen tum a ni.
Nimin chawhma lam khan Health Directorate Conference Hall-ah Health & Family Welfare Board Vice Chairman, Dr. ZR. Thiamsanga hovin Quarantine Centre-a awm mek ten vote an thlak ve theih dan tur sawiho niin State Election Commission-in hemi chungchanga rawtna thlen tura a tih angin Quarantine Centre-a awm COVID-19 RT-PCR test result negative ten VC/LC Election-a vote an thlak theih dan turte sawiho a ni a, Quarantine Centre-a awmte hi COVID-19 Incubation Period, ni 14 awm tura tih an ni a, hetihlai hian RT-PCR result-ah False Negative 100 zelah 30 a awm theih avangin negative te pawh hi an Quarantine Period a la zawhloh chuan an him ngei a ni tih sawi fak theih a ni lova. Chuvangin Quarantine Centre-a awm zawng zawngte chuan Postal Ballot hmanga vote an thlak theih nan State Election Commission hnenah rawtna thlen nghal nise an ti a, nimin vek khan lehkha hi buatsaih nghal tura tih a ni.

Manchester United manager Erik Ten Hag chuan Cristiano Ronaldo chu Europa league ah inkhel bul tan tura a inpeih thu a sawi. Kum 37 a upa Portuguese striker hian nilaithawhtan zanlai a Real Sociedad an hmachhawn hunah inkhel bul a tan ngeiin a rinawm.
Tun season kal mek ah Premier League match ruk atangin Ronaldo hian match khat ah bak inkhelh bul a la tan lova, inkhelh bul a tan tum hian Brentford lakah 4-0 in an mualpho nghe nghe. Ronaldo hian club pre season tour a zawm lova, heihi Dutch manager Ten Hag an a la chhawr tam loh chhan pawh ni pawh in a lang.
‘Ballon d’Or vawi nga lai dawng tawh tu hi tunkar Europa League a in match khelh turah inkhel bul a tan thei ang em?’ tia reporter te zawhna Ten Hag chuan chhangin,”Aw, thei tehreng mai. Brentford laka inkhel bul a tan hnu khan a la tan leh lova, Tunah hian inkhel bul tan turin a inring hle” a ti.
Tin, Premier League lama player chhawr tam loh Harry Maguire, Luke Shaw, Aaron Wan-Bissaka, Casemiro leh Fred te chu Europa League lama inkhelh bul tan thei tur zinga mi anni ve bawk.
Ten Hag erawh in Europa League inelna chu zangkhai taka lak a tum loh thu a sawi. ”Game tinah hnehna kan chan a ngai. Inelna awm zawng zawng ah champion nih kan duh a, chuvang chuan engkim mai hi urhsa taka kan lak a ngai. Team mai nilo in squad kan nei a, game tinah ka player zawng zawng te hi ka tilawm theilo, mahse an zavai in hun remchang pek anni dawn a, an hmang tangkai anih chuan inkhelh hun an nei belh zel ang ” a ti.

Serchhip, 26th April, 2016 :
District Institute of Education & Training (DIET), Serchhip buatsaihin DIET[dot]computer Centre ah ni thum awh tur Microsoft Excel hman dan training buatsaih a ni a, Serchhip District chhunga Government Middle School atangin zirtirtu pakhat theuh he training ah hian an tel a, Pu R. Lalrinawma, Lecturer, DIET in zirtirna a pe a ni.
Serchhip District chhunga Government Middle School ziritrtute tana Microsoft Excel Training hi batch thum koh a ni a, batch hmasa ber chuan April 26 - 29 an training ang a, batch hnihna in May 3 - 6 training neiin batch thumna in May 10 - 13 chhung an training ang.
DIET, Serchhip ah hian[dot]computer Centre changtlung tak NIELIT, Aizawl nen tangkawp a din a ni a, tunah pawh hian NIELIT hnuaia Course on[dot]computer Concept (CCC) zirna kalpui mek niin mi 100 chuang in exam an hmachhawn tawh a ni.
Source: DIPR, Serchhip

Director Me Pua thlakmi tangah kawlram chung lemcawng thiam minthang tuk asimi hna Kyaw Thu, Zin Wine, Saing Saing Kham Hlaing, Cho Pyonge, Aye Myat Thu, Poe Mahme Tha tibantuk hna le adang lemcawng thiam tampi hna nih lem an cawnnak zukcawl asi.
Saing Saing nihcun hla leiah thazang tampi a rak chuah pinah lemcawnnak lei zongah character he atlakning bakin arak izuamnak zongcu hmuh khawh asi. Si lei thiamnak ah Queen asimi Poe Mahme Tha cu a voikhatnak bik zukcawl chung arak ilanghnak asinain zeitluk thiam dah asi timi zong alang kho lai.
“Pyidoh Kahdeh Ngya” timi zukcawl thlak hram thok asicang timi thawngpang arak than thawk bak khan mitampi hna nghahlang mi pakhat arak sicolh. Romantic takin an ithlakmi cheukhat hna le afanu sinah Kyaw Thu biachim mi hna nihcun mipi arak lawmhter khun hna hlah maw tiding tiang khin asi.
Mahticun tu February 23 ni ahcun “Pyidoh Kahdeh Ngya” timi zukcawl official trailer cu mipi hna duhtawk zohkhawh dingin an rak tar cang. Si lei thiamnak ah Queen asimi Poe Mahme Tha cu a voikhatnak bik zukcawl chung arak ilanghnak asinain zeitluk thiam dah asi timi zong alang kho lai.
Kawlram mipi tampi hna lungthin a hnoter dingmi tidoihpuai huham tangah duhdawtnak tuanbia pakhat cu hla ah serin “Pyidoh Kahdeh Ngya” timi zukcawlpi cu aralia dingmi March 5 thokin kawlram pumpi ah chuah hram thok asicang lai tiah theih asi. Mahtluk a zohtu minung tampi angeitu zukcawl official trailer cu rak zohve tuah hnik law.

... (70 chars skipped) ...

Hmeichhe MMA fighter 2-ten an insual hmaa mipui pungkhawm hmaa an inhmachhawn laiin, dawhsan chungah mipui barakhaihin rinloh takin an infawp thut tih hriat a ni.
He thil dangdai tak hi March 11 liam ta a thleng kha niin, dan pangngaiah chuan fighters te chu stage-ah inhmachhawnin an inhrosa vel thin a, huai zawk leh tha zawk anga lan tumin an bei uluk viau thin a ni.
Prague’s 02 arena bout ah erawh mak tak maiin hmeichhe fighters 2 Karina Pedro leh Denisa Ryndova te chu stage-ah inlanin an 2 hian inhrosak leh lan hlauhawm tum a hnekin an infawp ta daih a nih chu!
Denisa chuan he a opponent nen an infawhna clip hi a Instgram page-ah a pholang a, “Somehow I didn’r realised that the whole gala @clashofthestars is already over” tiin caption-ah a ziak lang a ni.
Fighter pakhat zawk OnlyFans star Karina pawhin a thiannu clip post ang hi social media lamah thuziak nen a post darh zui ve bawk tih hriat ani.

US Hluttaw nih Biden teinak a fehter cangka in President Donald Trump nih “January 20, 2021 ah tluang tein Biden sinah uknak ka pek ko lai,” tiah cathanh a chuah colh.
Trump cathanh cu White House Deputy Chief of Staff Dan Scavino nih a Twitter account ah a thlah.
Trump cu, US Hluttaw ah buainak chuahpi dingin a ṭanhtu pawl a fial hna ruangah Twitter company nih a account a hrenpiak i ca a thlah kho rih lo. Mah hi hmet law tling tein rel khawh asi.
Trump nih, “thimnak phichuak cu ka lungtling naisai lo nain, January 20 ah tluang tein uknak ka pek ko lai,” ati.
Cun, kai cuh ṭhan te lai ti zong a chim. “Ka term 1nak a donghnak si hmanh sehlaw, America a Liannganter Ṭhan dingin kan i zuammi a hramthok lawng si rih,” ati.
Trump cu kum 2024 ah president aa cuh ṭhan te lai, tiah ramkhel thiamsang tampi nih an chim. Tutan i Trump cathanh zoh tikah cuh ṭhan aa tim tak ko ti a lang, aa leet te hnga dek maw.
President-thimmi Joe Biden nih kum 2021 chungah ralzaam 125,000 ka lak hna lai, ati. Mah hi hmet law tling tein rel khawh asi.

Ben Affleck leh Garner thawkdun dawn
Khawthlang milarte nun dan khu chu Mizo society nen chuan a inpersan thin khawp mai - American actor Ben Affleck chuan film a siam dawn a, a changtu tur zingah a nupui hlui Jennifer Garner a tel dawn! Ben Affleck leh Jennifer Garner te hi kum 2005 khan inneiin, kum 15 chuang an inneih hnuah 2018 khan an inthen. Hemi hnu hian Ben Affleck hian a 'ex' tho Jennifer Lopez lam a hawi leh ngha a, kum 2022 khan an innei leh nghe nghe.
Hetiang boruak karah hian Ben Affleck hian a nupui hlui Jennifer Garner a thawhpui dawn a, Jennifer Lopez tan ngaihtha taka awm hle hle a harsa mai thei.
Kum 51 mi Ben Affleck hian Netflix film pakhat 'Animals' a direct dawn a, a changtu tur lam pawh an tifel chho mek. He crime thriller film-a chang tur zingah Garner hming a lan avang hian boruak a awm nghal hat a, thu mu hnu kaihthawh tharin a awm leh mek. He film-ah hian Matt Damon a chang dawn a, Garner nen hian an changdun dawn a ni - an tihchhuah hun tur erawh tarlan a la ni lo.

2020 thimnak tuah hlan in Tlangcung party thazang kan herhlo anrak ti hnga Ziah Tlangcung mi kan hmunram ah anmah Kawl NLD party nih teinak hmuh le an mah tangkun hna minung fialchukcho dingah an cuhter hnga hnga. Ziah Party pakhat tlaihmi cozah serdingah khati lommam in an cawlcang hnga.NLD nih remdaihnak le rualremnak a duh taktak ko ahcun Ziah!
Kan ramthen ca i ramthen party nih teiahcun CM tuan khawhnak a khamtu 261/(b) khi a remhduh hngalo.Ziah kum pi kum 5 (Cozah term khat chung) a tlaih cang miah rak kalpi cangmi remdaihnak lamthluan a dirter hnga.
Cucahcun tutan NLD nih a tuah cuahmah mi Tlangcung parties hna he Cozah thar sernak le remdaihnak kong i ţanţi ding ceihmainak hma a lak mi ah Kachin, Mon, tehna nih thitha in an cohlan lo khi ruah phu ngai asi.

MCC-Tulsa in September 16-17, 2015 sung Conference nei ding
Laizom-te,
America gam, Tulsa khuapi aom Myanmar Christian Church, Senior Pastor Rev.Dr.Kham Khan Khai(Sia Khaipi) te makaihna leh thuvaipi hawmsiamna tawh kimuhkhoppi-na(Conference) September kha 16 -17, 2015 sungin nei ding cih thumanpha ki za hi.
Hih Conference pen “Myanmar Christian Churches Fellowship of America(MCCFA)” ci-in, USA leh Canada gam aom Kawlmi leh Zomite deidanna omlo, thuummi pawlpi khempeuh kimuhkhoppi-na ahi hi. Hicibang kimuhkhoppi-na pen abeisa hun lai in aom nailo a khatvei-na hi-a, tuhun thupiang tuamtuam te thupitak leh zaitak aa kikupkhoppi dingin lunggulhna nei hi. Tua ahih manin hih Conference pen tuhun aa pawlpi leh thuummite adingin phattuamna tampi piang sak ding hi cih upna ki nei hi.
Innteek Pawlpi-te hanciamna tawh Conference a pai Zinmangte ading tun’na, omna ding mun leh annek tuidawn vaihawm sak ding uha, zinte bel apai na ding Air Tickets a kipan adang abei khempeuh amau leh amau ki sik ding ahi hi.
Hih thu tawh kisai-in a lunglutte ahizong, a kician in a theibehnuamte ahizong thu kicing atheinuamte in hehpihna tawh Pawlpi Website “mcctulsa.com” ah ki en thei, ki kan thei hi-cih thuhoih thumanpha ki za ahih manin floridathupuak pan kong hawmsawn uh hi.
Lungdamna lianpi tawh,

Sports Minister in hawng
Mizoram State Sports Council Non-Residential Coaching Programme chu nimin tlai khan Sports Minister Robert Romawia Royte chuan Hawla Indoor Stadium, Aizawl-ah a hawng a, “Mizoram leh Sports Department bungthar kaina a ni,” a ti.
Mizoram State Sports Council Non-Residential Coaching Programme-ah hian Basketball Coaching kal mipa naupang 51 leh hmeichhe naupang 1 an awm mek a; Boxing Coaching kal mek Mipa 30 leh hmeichhia 4, Table Tennis Coaching kal mek mipa 30 leh hmeichhia 8; Tennis Coaching kal mek mipa 23 leh hmeichhia 16; Weightlifting Coaching kal mek mipa 24 leh hmeichhia 16 leh Wrestling Coaching kal mek mipa 17 leh hmeichhia 13 an awm a, an vaiin mi 227 an ni. Coaching Programme hi thla 4 chhung niin, Session a zawh hunah admission hawn leh tur a ni anga, trainee te performance record hi an nu leh pa te pek thin an ni ang.

Model Cris Galera kum 33 mi chuan September thla liam ta khan mite hriatah amah leh amah a inneih thu puang chhuakin, hun rei erawh a innei hlawhtling ta lo a nih hmel! Ni 90 a liam meuh chuan amah bawk chu a then leh ta ani.
Mi tam tak chuan nupui pasal an neih hnuah, an mahni milpui nupui/pasal an tawng fuh lo nia an inngaih chuan inthen mai duhna thinlung an pu nghal thuai a, an kawppuite chu inthen turin rawtna an thlen thin a ni. Cris Galera sawidanin, mipa te chu a ning hluah hluah tih sawiin, amah leh amah chu mipa pasal neih aiah a innei ta zawk a ni.
A hnuah model kum 33 a upa chuan mahni leh mahni han inneih ngawt mai chu a khawharthlak ang reng tih tarlangin, mahni chauha chhungkaw din tum chu tifuh tawk loah inngaiin amah a neih atanga ni 90 liam hnuah inthen leh mai chu tha a tih thu a sawilang bawk.
A sawi zel danin, model Cris Galera chuan amah nilo hmangaih dang a tawn thu a sawi a, hmathar thlirin hun a hmang mek tih a sawi a ni.
Cris chuan September thla liam ta khan Brazil, Sao Paulo khawpui, Catholic Biak inah pangpar bawr kengin amah leh amah a inneia, tianga mahni pasala a neih lai thlalak chu social media lamah a tarlang tawh nghe nghe a ni.

January ni 25 hian National Voters Day vawi 7-na chu rampumah hman a ni dawn a. “Greater Participation for a Stronger Democracy” tih thupuia hmangin suB-themE atan “Empowering Young and Future Voters” tih hman a ni.
Kumin January ni 1 a kum 18 tling tawhte tan chuan Electoral Roll-a inthunluh hi India khua leh tui dik tak tihtur pawimawh tak a ni. Electoral Roll-a kan chanchinte a dik nge diklo tih enfiah a, diklo a awm a nih chuan a rang lama siam that tur a ni. Siamthatna turin form 8 hman tur a ni.
Form 6 chu roll-a inthun thar duh tan leh Assembly bial dang atanga insawn duh tan hman tur a ni a, Form 7 chu Electoral Roll a chuang tawh, thi/pem tawhte paih nan hman tur a ni. Form 8 chu Roll-a mahni chanchin diklo/thlalak fiahlo siamthat nan a hman tur niin Form 8A chu Assembly bial chhung tho, veng danga insawn duh tan hman tur a ni.
A chunga form hrang hrangte hi Election Branch, DC Office, Aizawlah a thlawnin lakchhuah theih a ni.

Vawiin chawhnu dar 1 khan Chief Secretary Conference Room ah National Health Mission hnuaia 5th Governing Body Meeting neih a ni. He hun hi Chief Secretary Pi L.Tochhong chuan a kaihruai a, meeting ah hian NHM 2014 - 2015 budget te thlirho a ni a, hmalak dan turte sawiho in, District tih chakna turte an rel bawk a. NHM hnathawh that vanga cash incentive dawn dan turte an rel a, Human Resource policy State Programme Mangement Unit in a duan chu an pawm bawk a ni.
He meeting ah hian Dr. K.Ropari, Principal Director, Dr. Rohmingthanga Ralte, Director of Health Services, Dr. Lalbiakkima, Director, Hospital & Medical Education bakah Health Department a Officer hrang hrang leh Director, Presbyterian Hospital te, Medical Superintendent, Serkawn Christian Hospital te MUP leh MHIP atangte in an kal khawm a ni.

CCpur, July 25, 2014: Hmar Peoples' Convention-Democratic (HPC-D) chun tulai hnaia Aizawla Pu Hmingchunghnung a in tuola Mizoram Police hai motor bomb hmanga suksieta um kha anni thaw ngei a ni thu HPC-D thusuok siem chun a hril. Pu Hmingchunghnunga hi tuta Sinlung Hills Development Council (SHDC) a Chairman ni lai mek a nih.
Press Release chun 1994 Peace Accord, Mizoram le HPC inkar a sign ani khan Hmar mipui chun HPC Pu Hmingchunghnunga inrawi chu ringzo taka hmalatu le thuoitu dinga a dande a , sienkhawm HPC demand tak, India Constitution Six Schedule hnuoia ADC intlun ta nekin Peace Accord chun SHDC chu a piengpui ta lem, le Pu Hmingchunghnung hi Mizoram Sorkar leh indangna um lova Hmar hnam phatsan tu anih tiin a hril.
Chun hi hmaa HPC(D),Centre le Manipur Sorkar in Suspension of Operaion(SoO) an thaw zing lai MAP in Parvachawm, Lungthulien, Ngampabung le Patpuihmun khuo hai-ah nunrawng taka an va chetna lei khawm hi Hmingchunghnung le Mizoram Sorkar kutsuok lieu lieu anih a, HPC(D) in nuom sien chu khang hun lai khawm khan mipui ngaituona lei ninaw sien chu action a lak thei zing ti hai khawm an chuonsa bawk.
''HPC-D Special Operation Units hai chu Aizawl le Mizoram hmun dang dang-ah kan um zinga, kan thil thaw hi a tul chun kan thaw nawk ding. Hmar mipui hmusittu le suk thlabartu chu kan nuom hun hunah kan target thei zing ti hi Mizoram Sorkar khawma lo hrie raw seh'' tiin HPC-D chun thusuok a siem anih.

Kum 40 mi hrawng Pu Peka cu Kawlram mi a si ih Mizoram, Bairabi South ah thingat in caan reipi arak um zo. June 25, 2021 (Zirtawpni) zanlam nazi 4:00 hrawngah a rualpa thawn Tlawngral ihsin tiva an tan, tithuknak ihsin an leuh ih Pu Peka cu vanduaithlak zetin a leuhsuak thei lo ih a pilhlo.
Runsuak man loin a cangsual ih a fen that, ti tla an um ti an theih veten Joint YMA Bairabi kaihruainak in ruang an hawl hngal. Khawen laiah an hmu loin a zan khalah an hawl vivo.
Cutin June 26 (zarhte ni) sun nazi 12:20 ah tileuh thiam Pu F. Lalnunsanga in Pu Peka ih ruak cu a hawl hmu (Bairabi South, Mission Veng ih um Pu F. Lalnunsanga in tiva fen ruak tam zet arak sar zo, tuiṭum ih ruang an hawlnak khalah ara thleng pekte ih a hawl hmu hngal).
Pu Peka ih innsang pawl biak tlang dan ding an thei lo, a hminpum le a kumziat khal an thei lo (A dam lai zuk khal an nei lo). A ruang cu Bairabi PHC-ah post-mortem an tuah hnuah Bairabi South thlanmual ah Joint YMA Bairabi Vice President Pu H. Lalbiakmawia in a vuiliam.
Bairabi ah tiva fen an um tikah Joint YMA in ṭuanvo a la hngal ih, an kaihruainak hnuaiah Branch pahnih; North le South Branch in ruang hawl hna an ṭuan.
Pu Peka hi Bairabi North Branch YMA in kuang an tum ih, a thlan cu South Branch YMA in an laihsak. Pu Peka ruang cu zanlam nazi 3;30PM ah Bairabi South thlanmual ah an vuiliam. Tiva fen ruak hawlnak ah Sub-Hqrs YMA Kolasib le Zampuimanga Group YMA hruaitu pawlin an va bawm ṭheu. (Issued by: Bairabi Joint YMA)

Karen Ram Ah SAC Ralhrang Nih Khuami 16 Kuli An Phurh Ter Hna; Minung 1 An Thah. Karen National Union (KNU) humhak nak hmunhma chungah SAC ralhrang hna cu pehzulh in cawlcawngh caah khua mi minung 16 hna cu hramhram in Kuli an phurh ter hna i khua mi minung 1zong ralhrang nih an thah tiah kan theih.
KNU humhak nak hmun chungah SAC ralhrang hna nih April 3 le ni 4 lio ah Mya-thar-kon khua cu luh hnawh in khua mi cycle 5 lak piak hna, cun inn bauh le thilri an fir piak hna pin ah Lat-pan-phyo khua mino pakhat zong a ruang um lo in an thah tiah khua mi nih an chim.
Mah pin ah khua mi minung 16 zong ralhrang nih lam hmuhsak tu ding le an thilri phurh ter dingah an tlaih hna. An tlaih mi hna 16 chungah minung 7 cu April 5 ah an thlah hna nain minung 9 cu an thlah rih hna lo.
Khua mi hna cu tlaih le hremnak an pek hna caah khua kiangkap um mi khuate chuekhat zong an khua ning pi in an zam dih hna, ralzam hna caah eidin, sii-ai tibantuk bawmhchanh an hauh lio a si’tiah mibawmchan tu phu pakhat nih a chim.TLT

Home Ministry sawi danin Kashmir-a dan leh thupek kengkawha tungding tur leh helpawlte tuk dawl turin sipaite hi tirh an ni. Jammu & Kashmir Police Director General Dilbag Singh chuan Kashmir hmar lamah sipai an tlem avangin sipai company 100 an dil tih a sawi a. Sipai company khat zelah sipai 100 zel an awm a ni.

Coronavirus vaccine University of Oxford leh phar giant AstraZeneca tena tangruala an siam dun chu kumin kum tawp hmain health authority tena an pawm hman beisei a nih thu UK media te chuan an tarlang.
He vaccine hi vaccine siam meka kal thui ber ni mekin ‘Thlaruk chhungin, chu aia hma mah chuan kan chhawpchhuak thei ang’ tiin British sorkar thuneitu sangin a sawi chu The Times chanchinbuin a tarlang a ni.
UK Joint Committee on Vaccination and Immunisation in protocol a siam dan chuan pawm a nih veleh vaccine chu kum 65 chin chuanglamah pek hmasak phawt tur a ni a, chumi hnuah putling upa lamah pek leh tur a ni. Kum 65 chin chunglam te pek hnuah kum 50 bawr vel te hnenah pek leh tur a ni.
UK sorkar chuan he vaccine siam mek hi peihfel a nih veleha a lak nghal theih nan dose 100 million a order sa tawh a, thuneitu ten phalna an la pe lo chungin damdawi hi siam mup mup reng a ni.
Vaccine siam pawh ni se harsatna la awm leh tur chu tam tham tak siam leh thawn chhuahah a la ni tho.
Vaccine hmuhchuah pawh ni se thlaruk chhungin mitin pek theih a ni dawn lo hrim hrim a, thlaruk atanga thla kua inkar chu pek vek turin hun mamawh ni dawna ngaih a ni bawk.
(THE AIZAWL POST – Rampawn)

• Taxation in chhiah hmu hnem.
• GST hman hunah chhiah lut tam dawn.
• GST hman tan ni.
Thla leh July Ni 1 atanga hman tur Goods and Services tax (GST) atan inbuatsaihna ngawrh taka kalpui mek a ni a, Central Excise and Service Tax Commissionerate, Shillong atanga lokal te pawhin Mizoram-a sumdawng te zirtirna te pe in, sumdawng te pawhin GST atan hian an inbuatsaih mek bawk.
Kum khata Nuai 10 leh a chung lam bungrua emaw, tha lei chhuakte leh Mizoram pawn atanga bungrua la luttute chu GST hnuaiah an inziah luh vek a ngai a, permanent account number (PAN) an neih vek ngai bawkin, GST hnuaiah online veka thawh a nih tawh dawn avangin sumdawng te’n an account bu felfai taka an vawn a ngai tawh dawn a.
Mizoram Taxation Deparment chuan kum kalta 2016-2017 chhung khan Sorkarin an target tura a bituk chu Nuai 7320 -in an khum a. GST hman a nih hun chuan hei aia sum tam zawk hmuh an in beisei a ni.
Kumin kum kal mek April leh may thla chhunga chhiah an hmuh tawh zat hi cheng vbc 71 nuai 65 sing 4 & 5,635/- a tling tawh a, kum 10 liam ta 2007-2008 a Taxation in chhiah a hmuh zat cheng vbc 70 nuai 3 leh sing 7 vel chu chu kumin 2017-2018 thla 2 chhunga chhiah hmuh aiin a tlem zawk a ni.
Kum kalta 2016-2017 khan vbc 313 nuai 90 sing 5 & 3471 thawk chhuakin an hmuh chhuah tura bituk sak chu vbc 70 chuangin an khum a, target an khum tamna chhan hi Mizoram Entry tax leh Zu chhiah atanga sum an hmuh hnem vang nia sawi a ni.

Dokna: "Thathu taw kisai thukhun nam Lite in bang teng ziam?"
Zokikna:
Thathu taw kisai thukhun nam lite in Jesu Khris upna hangin akinga ngupkhiatna thu manpha lungdamna thu tangko thei natu lampi ahi hi. Hi lungdamna thu sia hoitak ih tangko theina tuin a ol mama thu nam Lite a son nopna ahi hi.
Amasa phit belin thathu taw kisai thukhun in, “Pathian in nang hong it a, nang a tuin a lamdang vai hong hawm sak hi” John. 3:16 na sungah, “ Pathia
... (1163 chars skipped) ... 
hian sesa ahi hi. Jesu Khris hangin ih mawnate hong kimaisak a, Pathian taw amaan kizopna ih nei thei hi.” Romte.5:8 na sungah, “ Pathian in eite a hongit na hibangin hong lak hi. Eite mawnei ih hi laitakin Khris in eite tangin thina hong thuak hi.” 1Corinte. 15:3-4 na sungah ngupna ih nga theina tuin Khris ih heak tu le ih up tu kisam hi, “… Lai Thiangtho hong sonna bangin Khris in eite tangin hong thi hi. Ama sia k vui-in Lai Thiantho hong son bangin nithum zawk ciangin hong tho to kik hi…” Jo
... (1163 chars skipped) ...
enna a thuak tu ka hihi. Ahizongin Jesu Khris in ka thuak tu thukhennateng hong lak sak siat zo hi. Ama ka upna hangin mawmaisakna a nga tu ka hihi. Ngupkhiatna ka nga na tuin ama ka muang hi. Alamdang nong hesuakna le mawmaina – tawntung nuntakna letsong hangin lungdam kong ko hi!Amen!’’
Hiteng aki-at thute na simna hangin Christ up tu khentatna na nei tha ziam? Na nei le hi a nuai-a akiat, “Tu ni-in Christ saang zo ing” ci lai ngual meek in.
Thathu taw kisai thukhun nam Lite in bang teng ziam?

Hetah mikhual chauh ka ni,
Van khi ka in a ni;
Lei hi thlaler ram a ni,
Van khi ka in a ni.
Hlauhawmte leh lungngaihnate chuan,
Ni tinin min hual vel thin;
Van khi ka Pa ram a ni,
Van khi ka in a ni.
Thlemna nasa mah sela,
Van khi ka in a ni;
Leiah hian zin chauh ka ni,
Van khi ka in a ni.
Ka hun hi a ral deuh deuh fo va,
Rei lo te a chinah chuan,
Ka la han thleng ngei ang a,
Van khi ka in a ni.
Ka chhandamtu kiangah khian,
Van khi ka in a ni;
Chawimawiin ka la awm ang,
Van khi ka in a ni.
Chutah mi thianghlimte an awm a,
Ka mi duh takte pawh kha;
Kan la han chawl ve ang a,
Van khi ka in a ni.
Chuvangin, ka phunnawi lo,
Van khi ka in a ni;
Leiah rethei mah ila,
Van khi ka in a ni.
Mathei lovin ka la han ding ang,
Lalpa ding lamah khianin;
Van, ka Pa awmna ram khi,
Van Khi ka in a ni.

Leitung ah tulaitak akum tampenpen dingin aki ummawh piteeknu pen Saturday ni in sita cih Italian Media te’n genkhia uhhi. Tua piteeknu minpen Emma Morano kici a, Italian gammi ahihi. Italy gamsung, Verbania City ateenna ah Saturday ni in hongnusia ahihi.
Amahpen kum 117 phakhinta a, leitung mihing lakah akum atampenpen “World’s Oldest Person” in aki ciamteh ahihi.

... (245 chars skipped) ... 
 ahang akikan ciangin aguizui in akumtam hiding kici hi. Apianna anuzong kum 91 nungta cihi. Apianpih asanggam tezong kum 100, Centenary khat acingpen pawlkhat om kici hi.
Emma Morano pen 1899 kumin asuak himawk ahih manin, 18 Century, 19 Century, 20 Century cihbangin Centuries thumbang nawkkha hi. Leitung galpi First World War leh Second World War cihtezong anihmah in na nawkkha hi.

Vawiin chhun dar 12:30 khan Pu K. Saitluanga, MIS, District Information & Public Relations Officer, Serchhip chuan Mizoram Journalist Association, Serchhip District memberte chu a pisa-ah kum thar thingpui in hona leh inkawm hona a neih pui.
DIPRO chuan kum kalta lamahte MJA te nen thawh hona tha tak an neih thin chu lawmawm a tih thu a sawi a, hun kal zel turah pawh a hma aia thaa tawh hona an neih zel theih a beisei thu a sawi a. Pu David L. Thangliana, MIS, Director, I&PR aiawhin chibai a buk bawk a ni.
Kum kaltaa I&PR Department hmalakna tlangpui sawiin, MJA memberte State chhung leh pawna Tour neihpui an ni theite chu lawmawm a ti a. Kum thar tirah pawh Tour buatsaih leh nghal anih tur thu a sawi bawk. MJA Serchhip tana Press Club sakna turin Health Department ram hman hawh tur chu tih fel tawh anih bakah Club Building sakna tur Rs. 10 Lakh pawh pek fel anih tawh thu a sawi bawk a ni.
Pu C. Ramengmawia, President, MJA pawhin thu sawiin, DIPRO kaihhruaina hnuaia tha taka hna an thawk tlang thei chu lawmawm a tih thu a sawi a. An kal zelna turah department tlawpna an mamawh thu sawiin, thawh hona tha tak an neih chhunzawm zel a beisei thu a sawi.
He hunah hian MJA Serchhip
District memberte an tel tha hle a ni.

India gamsung West Bengal State sungah Passenger pua Bus khat luisungah kiasuk in, mi 36 in sihlawh uh cih AFP pan kiza hi. Tua Passenger Bus sungah akigawm in mi 55 atuangkhawm uh hi a, Monday zingsanglam in atuahsia ahihi.
Berhampore District, Daulatabad aom leikidawh tungah apailaitak in apang aki umna Railing te phukhia in, tuisung ah akiasuak ahihi.

ai laitak ahihi.

Hih tuahsiatna apiankhit ciangin ahuhding in Rescue Operation te ziakailua ahih manin Local te leh Police tezong buaina omman cisawnsawn hi. Khuasung mipi te hehlua mahmah uh a, Police mawtaw khat meitawh halsak in, adang khatzong suksiat sakgawp uhhi.

... (356 chars skipped) ...
nd Hospital ahzong vapha in, thunei tetawh kimukhawm uhhi.

Hih Passenger Bus akiatsukna tuipen thuk mahmah in, mawtaw zong akiatkhit ciangin avekin tumsukpah hi. Tuahang in Rescue Team te ii nasepna zong nawngkai leh hamsatuam mahmah cih kiza hi. Sawltak #zomidaily

Israel ram ah hian Benei Menashe te hian Ivrit a kan hman uar ber leh kei mahni leh kei mahni kan inbiak pawh a, Lusei tawnga kan sawi ngai tak meuh loh chu TODA tih hi a niin ka hria.
Hei pawh hi, TODA tih hi, Lusei tawnga kan sawi chuan "Ka lawm e" hi kan ti thla ve ngawt a, chhui chian chuan Toda kan tih hian KA kan sawi tel miah lo.
Toda tih lehna ni awm bera lang chu "Lawm e.." tih hi a ang khawp in ka hria.
Ka lawm e, tih hi kan leh dik dawn chuan "Ani mode" tihna daih a sin, mahse, a Ivrit ah chuan chutianga kan sawi fak dawn chuan, "Ani mode lekha" kan ti ta duah si, hei ve thung hi chu "I chung ah ka lawm e" tihna a ni.
Ani mode, kan tih ringawt chuan "Ka pawmpui e" tihna lam a kawk deuh leh ruih bawk si, entirnan; miin thil ru ah min lo puh ta a, "He pa ta hi i ru a mi" tiin min lo zawt ta a, "Aw min puhna chu ka pawm e" tia sawina ang ki ah hian "Ani mode" kan hmang ve leh thung hlauh si.

Naupan laia Shillong a sikul kal thin han nih ve takah chuan a khaw hming ngawt mai pawh hian lung ati leng a, chutih lai a pawlrualpuite min ngaih tir leh thin. Kumpinu-in India a awplai a an hmunpui pakhat a lo nih thinna khan hlutna siamin, belhchian pawh a dawlna chhan niin a lang. A ram neitu Bakthak (Khasi) ho hi an tribal nihna tam takah la lang thin nachungin, kum tam tak Kumpinu thutchilh an nihna a hriat theih viau thin awm e.
St. Anthony’s High School-ah ka lut thin a, Don Bosco hostel a ka insuan luh hma zawng chuan ka pa u, ka ni Biaknemi, w/o Paul Z. Hauhnar (fam) te in-ah ka khawsa thin a, Laitumkhrah, Beat House ral lehlam, Bakthak ho Presbyterian biak in chhak chiahah, Meena Cottage chu ka awmna thin a ni nghe nghe.

Tanintharyi Ah SAC Ralkap Khah Mah Yah (561) Le PDF Kaphnih Kar Kahdohnak Ah Thi Le Hliam An Um Veve. Tanintharyi ramṭhen Meik pengkomh, Tanintharyi peng Ngyaungpinkun khua ah umhmun a khuarmi SAC ralkap Khah Mah Yah (561) hna cu mipi ralkap nih an kah hna caah SAC ralkap pahnih an thi, hliamhmi an tam tiah theih a si.
Kaphnih kar kahdohnak hin SAC ralkap nih hriamngan an hman caah mipi ralkap PDF pakhat Kyargyi (Kum 19) a thi ve i 4 nih hliam fak tuk lo an pu tiah chimphuannak nawlngeitu nih March ni 9 ah a chim.
Tanintharyi peng Ngyaungpinkun khua ah umhmun khuarmi ralkap hna cu March ni 7 ah mipi ralkap Meik-PDF, Meik pengkomh Tatyin (2), Meik (Pah Khah Phah) le Tanintharyi peng mipi ralkap fonh in an kah hna tiah tiah theih a si. Western News. The Chin Post

Aizawl Laipuitlang-a PWD office building chimin mi chenna in a hnâwl avanga chhiatna thleng mi 17 laiin nunna an chan chungchangah nimin khan Pu Raymond Lalbiakzama Advocate chuan Bawngkawn Police Station-ah FIR a thehlut.
Pu Lalbiakzama sawi danin he chhiatna thlenga nunna chan tam tak an awm chhan ber hi PWD, building hlauhawm leh hlauhawm loh hre ber tura ngaihte’n ṭhiat mai lova an dah leh chumi avanga mi tam takin nunna an chan a, bungraw tam tak an hloh bawk hi ngaihzam mai theih a ni lo a ni a ti a. Nikum lama a hlauhawmzia hre tawh tun thlenga PWD-in an office buildiang an la ṭhiah loh chungchang leh hemi avanga tawrhna leh chhiatna lo thleng hi chhui chiang a. A mawhphurtu chhui chhuak tur leh dan anga hrem ngei turin Police hnenah a thlen niin a sawi a ni.

August 20.2021 zalei sangah Hakha in Thantlang lei a rak panh mi ralhrangbu hna cu lampi ah Thantlang CDF nih an rak kahdoh hna i suimilam zei maw zat chung an i kap tiah khua mi hna nih an chim.asinain nizan an i kahdoh nak ruangah kap hnih lei in hliamtuar mi le mithi an um le um lo mi zei hmanh nih theih khawh a si rih lo.
August 21.2021 tuzing suimilam 9am ah Thantlang CDF le ralhrangbu hna cu hmun pakhat ah an i kap t’han tiah theih a si.cu pin ah tuzing suimilam 9am hrawng in Thantlang khuapi chungum ralhrang pawl nih bomb le meithal heh tiah an puah i khua mipi cheu khat hna thinphang in an um tiah khuami nih an chim.
Tuzanlei sangin Hakha um ralhrangbu tam lak te cu an motor he an hriamnam tling in Thantlang khuapi chungah a rak phanh caah khuami hna leng chuah vak i ralrin ding tiah theihternak thawngpang zong an tuah chap.
Hakha um ralhrangbu pawl hna a tu bantuk in Thantlang khuapi chungah a rak ra mi hna hi Thantlang kiangkap ah i kahdoh nak a chuah ruangah a si lai tiah ruah domh cio a si.mipi chuah vah ah i ralrin khun ding a si. ralhrangbu an cawlcangh deuh paoh ah Dalaan an cawlcangh ve caah kiangkap bih zoh cio a hau tiah khuami pakhat nih a chim.

The Chinland Post | 2023 February 7 — Myanmar ram ah 2022 January in 2022 December tiang kum 1 chung, bomrap ruang ah hliam a tuar mi le a nunnak a liam mi sualnak ngei lo mipi 390 an phan i cu chung ah hngakchia cheuthum cheukhat leng an i tel tiah UNICEF nih February 7 ah a thanh.
2022 kumkhat chung bomrap ruang ah upa a nunnak a liam mi le hliam a tuar mi 75 an um i cu chung ah 13 an nunnak a liam, 62 nih hliam an tuar tiah theih a si.
Kumkhat chung bomrap ruang ah hliam a tuar mi le a nunnak a liam mi hngakchia 133 an si. Hngakchia 35 an nunnak a liam cang i 98 nih hliam an tuar tiah UNICEF report ah hmuh khawh a si.
Sagaing ramṭhen ah hliam a tuar mi le a nunnak a liam mi sualnak ngei lo mipi 68 phanh caah a tambik a si.
A pahnihnak ah Rakhine ram nih a zulh i hliam a tuar mi le a nunnak a liam mi 68 an si tiah theih a si.
Atu UNICEF nih langhter mi cazin chung ah hin kahdohnak chung bomrap ruang ah a nunnak a liam mi hriamtlai le ralkap pawl telh a si lo i sualnak ngei lo mipi cazin lawng langhter a si tiah an chim.
Cun Myanmar ram ah siseh, adang khoika hmun hmanh ah hngakchia hna hi bomrap ruang ah aa hliam ding le a nunnak a liam ding an si lo tiah an langhter i bomrap hmannak zong hi dirter a herh tiah an langhter.

ziahluh niin mi 193 man an awm bawk a, heng bakah hian ramdang mi 17 zet man an nei bawk a ni.

Marc-Andre Ter Stegen-a dream XI-ah Lionel Messi-a'n hmun a chang ve lo
Mi tam zawk chuan Lionel Messi hi khawvel footballer tha ber an ti hialin a rinawm. Chutihlaiin a teammate hlui Marc-Andre Ter Stegen erawh chuan a team duh a thlan chhuah player 11 zingah a telh hauh lo. Ligue 1 lama a kal hnu hian Messi hian Barcelona lama a khelh thin dan a phak lo hle a, hei vang hian Paris Saint-Germain lamah pawh a tlatlum lutuk rih lo.
Kum 34 hian league-ah goal hnih chiah a la khung a, Champions League lama a team a tlakpui tawh bawk. Real Madrid forwad Karim Benzema an hat-trick an siam meuh phei kha chuan fans lamin Messi an boo khum nasa a nih kha.
Tun hnai chho a harsatna a tawh vang leh Barcelona goalkeeper Marc-Andre ter Stegen-a'n dream XI-a a telh loh vang hian Messi hian inkhelh a thim ta lo tihna erawh a ni lo. Ballon d'Or tum 7 dawng tawh Messi hi mual chhunga player hlauhawm ber pakhat a la ni mek.
Marc-Andre Ter Stegen-a dream XI hi i pawm pui em? Han en chhin teh le. Balswich, Pique, Rudiger, Jordi Alba, Dani Alves, Sergio Busquets, Xavi, Iniesta, Frenkie de Jong, Reus, Gotze.

Shan ramkulh chaklei, Namsan peng, Namsan palek sakhan cu TNLA nih a kah I a lak lio ah a zaam mi palek bawi Tun Soe Thein nih a hruai mi minung 20 phu khat le kawl ralkap Commando phu in ralbawi Kyaw Thu Htwe nih a hruai mi minung 20 tluk phu khat, kawl ralkap le palek an zapi te minung 40 tluk cu an zaam nak ah dothlennak phu nih an kah hna caah an zapi tein an thi tiah kan theih khawh.
December 11 zinglei suimilam 4 tluk ah TNLA nih Namsan palek sakhan cu a kah I a lak lio ah palek bawi Tun Soe Thein hruainak in a zaam mi minung 20 tluk phu le kawl ralkap commando phu in ralbawi Kyaw Thu Htwe hruainak in a zaam ve mi minung 20 tluk phu cu an vai I fonh I cu phukomh hna cu December 12 ni ah TNLA nih a kah than hna caah an zapi tein an thi tiah kan theih.
Cu lawng si loin nihin zing Namkhan khua um kawl ralkap hna sakhan cu sungh lo nak ding ah kawl ralkap nih vanlawng in an rak chiahpiak mi bawmtu minung 70 lak ah minung 25 zong TNLA he kahdohnak ah an thi I a tang mi hna cu an zaam tiah kan theih khawh.

INTACH Mizoram Chapter ten Mizo zinga Kristiana inpe hmasa ber Taibawnga leh Mizoram chhunga missionary boral hmasa ber Howard B.Dinwiddie te hriatrengna lungphun an siamthat, Chief Minister Office thlang, Pu J.Malsawma In luhna kawta mi chu vawiin ni 30 December 2016 chawhnu dar 1:00 khan INTACH Mizoram Chapter Secretary Pu Thanseia’n a hawng.
Lungphun hawnna inkhawm hmanpuitu bialtu Minister Pu Lal Thanzara chuan Mizoram tana mi pawimawh leh hmasa te hriatrengna lungphun a duh apiang tlawh theih tura ualau taka siam a ni chu lawmawm tiin a buaipuitu INTACH Mizoram Chapter te chungah lawmthu a sawi a. Lungphun siamna tura MLA Local Development Scheme hminga Rs 4,06,000/- a lo tumsak thei pawh lawmawm tiin Mizo thil hlui vawnthat leh humhalh kawnga INTACH hmalakna leh thawhrimna ah lawmthu a hrilh bawk.
Lungphun hawnna inkhawm hi Pu P.Rohmingthanga, Convener, INTACH Mizoram Chapter-in a kaihruai a, Pu Rinsanga, Co-Convener, INTACH Mizoram Chapter-in lungphun buatsaih chhoh dan report a pe bawk.

Thingtlang nu lehkha zir lo; nu mawlmang ve tak, lo neia ei zawng thin ka ni. Nikum hmasa mai khan kan pain min lo boral san a, kum khat chuang chu ka lo hmeithai ve ta reng mai. MNYF in Bill pass sawifiah
MNF Thalai, MNYF Hqrs. chuan August 5, 2023 khan ZPM Thalaite chuan Forest Conservation (Amendment) Bill, 2023 sawihona ah Mizoram MP (Rajya Sabha) K. Vanlalvena chu vote thlâk ngam lo leh bill duhlohna lantir duh lova tlanchhia ah an puh tih thuchhuah siama tarlangin, he Bill sawiho a nih hma hian Rajya Sabha Chairman in Manipur chungchang sawi a rem tih loh avangin opposition MP te chuan House an chhuahsan vek thu MNF Thalaite chuan an sawi a, K. Vanlalvena pawh hian he Bill, Forest thuneihna chhuh thensakna tur Bill pass puitu nih a duh loh avangin House hi a chhuahsan ve leh niin an tarlang.

CSS-a thawk ten June 15 thleng ngaihchan rel
All Mizoram CSS Employees Co-ordination Committee chuan sawrkar laka an thilphut chungchangah tun thla ni 15 thleng khian sawrkar ngaihchan an tum thu an sawi.
All Mizoram CSS Employees Co-ordination Committee hian nimin khan an hnuaia Department hrang hranga CSS Association Office Bearer te nen Joint Meeting neiin Sawrkarin CSS Employees te hamthatna tura ‘Study Group on CSS’ a din chungchang leh hemi thu kal zel an sawiho a. CSS Employee te hamthatna tura August 16, 2021-a Sawrkar in Study Group a din tawh leh Study Group in rawtna alo siam tawh chu tun thlenga a hlawhtlinna an la hmulo chu pawi an tih thu an sawi a, tun thla ni 15 ralhma ngeia Sawrkarin he rawtna hi a tihhlawhtlinsak loh chuan an kal zel dan tur All Mizoram CSS Employees Co-Ordination Committee chuan an ngaihtuah ang tih an sawi a ni. CSS Employee te hi Mizoram Sawrkar hnuaiah kum engemawzat chhung thawk tawh leh Mizoram hmun kilkhawr ber thleng a hmasawnna hna thawktu an ni tih pawh sawiin, tun dinhmunah member 12,000 vel an awm thu an sawi bawk.

People Daily media ṭuanvo nei pakhat cun, “Shigella timi bacteria telmi tidai an in ruangah sungdok, santen, taksa a leng ih khuasung mipi 300 lenglo cu sizung ah zohawter dingin a tlar in an hngak’ tiah a sim ih “mina tamsawn cu nauhak le kum upa lam an si” a ti. “Santen suakter Bacteria rungah tidai an laknak hmunpi khal an phit ṭheh ih in-ti a har zet” tiah a sim.
China ram hi, in-ti ah an buai thei zet ih company suah mi tidai bottle lei thei lo cin cun ti sohthat an in.
Milian umtamnak khua pawl khal ah tidai a bal thotho ih in-ti ṭha suak thei dingin China’s Ministry of Water Resources in July thla sungah 256 million a hmangsuak zo a si.

Aizawl | May 19, 2023: Mizoram Board of School Education (MBSE)-in vawiin chhun dar 12:00 a, Higher Secondary School Leaving Certificate(HSSLC) 2023 result felfai tak a tichhuak thei chu MZP chuan lawmawm an ti tih thuchhuah siamin an tarlang a, MBSE thawktute thawhrimnaah lawmthu an sawi.
MZP chuan, kum 2022-2023 MBSE hnuaia pawl 12 exam beitu zirlai 78.665 laiin hlawhtlinna an chang chu lawmawm an ti hle a. Chutih rualin, la hlawhtling ve rihlo te pawh beidawng mai lova rilru thar pua a lehpekah chuan hlawhtlinna chang ngei tura bei turin an ngen bawk a ni.
MZP thuchhuah chuan, "Zirlaite chu hmalam pan zel tur kan nih angin nasa zawka tan la leh zual turin MZP chuan a sawm a, ram leh hnam hmangaihna nghet tak nei chunga hmalam pan zel turin zirlai hlawhtlinna chang thar zawng zawng te duhsakna a hlan a ni." tiin a tarlang bawk.

Vawiin Dt 16th December, 2020,(Nilaini) chawhma dar 9-11am inkarah Mizo thalaiten IAS Coaching Delhi lama kal tur full sponsorship zawnna written exam ( State Level Screening Exam) Pachhunga University College ah Mizoram Youth Commission chuan a buatsaih a. Application form thelut zat hi mi 282 niin, heng zing atang hian mi 208 ten exam an nei thei a ni. Heng exam atang hian a ti tha zual 40 te interview tur a koh an ni ang a, interview atang hian mi 20 thlan chhuah tur a ni dawn a ni.
He examna hi Dr. Vanlaltanpuia, Chairman, MYC leh Dr Tawnenga Principal PUC MYC a member ni bawk te chuan a hmunah an telpui thei bawk a ni. Interview hi ni 17 leh ni 18 chhung hian Interview an nei leh ang a, Result hi ni 18 tlai lamah tihchhuah beisei a ni. Heng mi 20 thlan chhuahte hian Delhi a zirna In thaah MYC bul tumin a thlawnin IAS coaching an kal thei dawn a ni.

NLD makaipi Daw Aung San Suh Kyi in Kawlgam President U Thein Sein tawh kimu dingin April 11,2012 ni ( 11:00 AM-12:00 PM), hun sung Muanhuai khuapi ( Nyipyidaw), Kumpi inn ah midang kihel loin amau nih bekin holimna thupitak nei khawm bek tham loin, Kumpite innkuan tawh sun an nekhawm uh cih kiza hi. Amau kimutuahna vai thu kicing akitheih nai loh hangin, mai lam gam sungvai (Politics) kalsuan zia ding tawh kisai kilamdanna lianpi a pianna ding thuk takin kikupna nei uh hi ngelngel dingin, Media lam vaisaite in ummawh uh hi.
Pawlkhat te' muhna le ngaihsutna ah, abeisa hun a Kawlgam thukan lamah makaipi le Prime Minister lui ahi General U Khin Nyunt in Bangkok Post Newspaper te' tung agenna ah, " abeisa May 30,2003 kum Depezin buaina tungtang ah NLD makaipi Daw Aung San Suh Kyi pen sihna ding dinmun pan ka honkhia ngei hi " ci-in leitungbup theih dingin genkhia a, tua bang thute a genna hangin galkap Kumpi lui ahi Senior General Than Shwe a sukkhak banah a minsiatna ding le Galkap Kumpi kipawl teng nasiatak sukha lua ahi hi. Daw Aung San Suh Kyi leh U Thein Sein te in abeisa August 19,2011 ni-in, amasa pen kimuhtuahna nei thei uh a, April 1,2012 ni-in, anihvei akimuhna nei uh hi. Tua amau nih holimna amankhit uh nitak lam mahin Daw Aung San Suh Kyi pen Nyipyidaw pan Yangon khuapi lam manawh in vanleng tawh ciahsuak pah cih kiza hi
Source: Shwe Hintar News

Deputy Passport Officer, Passport Seva Kendra, Aizawl chuan a hnuaia mi ang hian mipuite tan hriatirna a chhuah a ni :
Ni 26 May 2015 atang khan Passport Seva Kendra, Aizawl-ah ‘Online Passport Services’ hawn a ni tawh a, Mizorama atanga he Online Service hmanga passport dil duhte tan hriat tur pawimawh thenkhatte chu :
1. Passport thar emaw Renewal dil duhte chuan www.passportindia.gov.in ah online application an thawn tur a ni.
2. Application fee pawh online-a pek tur a ni a. He website hi user-friendly taka siam a nih avangin awlsam taka mahni in-register theih a ni. Zawhna i nei a nih pawhin he website kaltlangin chhanna i hmu zel thei ang.
3. He online system hian nasa takin passport dil chhung a ti tawi dawn a. Passport thar siam dilte tan ni 30 chhungin peihfel a ni ang a, Renewal ti duhte tan ni 15 chhunga tih felsak a ni bawk ang. Hetianga a ran theihna chhan chu police verification pawh online-a tih a ni tawh dawn a, a hmaa ni 15 vel nghah ngai thin kha ni 7 chhung leka tihfel theih tawh beisei a ni a. District hla zawk Lawngtlai leh Saiha atang pawhin awlsawm taka dil theih tawh dawn a ni.
4. Passport diltu chuan ama hming ngeia application a thehlut tur a ni a, application fee pawh amah ngeiin a pe tur a ni a, aiawh a hmang thei lovang.

Kan Then Tak
Pu Zakima Sailo (76), Sec-I, Presby. Kohhran hi Pu Sairuma Sailo leh Pi Chhunthuami te fa 7 zinga a upa ber dawttu niin September 1938-ah Tualchengah a piang a. Kum 1967-ah Vanlalsawmi d/o Chhundenga inneiin fapa 4 an nei.Intermediate of Arts thleng lehkha a zir a. Kum 1961-ah Fishery Supervisor thawk tanin Mizo zinga Fishery Dept-a lut hmasa ber a ni. Kum 1973-ah Fishery Officer leh, 1979-ah Suptd. of Fisheries-ah a kaisang a, 1998-ah Asst. Director in a pension a ni. Rawngbawlna lamah Sunday School zirtirtu, Chanmari Br. KTP Secretary, Music Com. Secretary, Ramthar Com. Fin. Secretary, Kohhran Zaipawl Conductor leh Chanmari Br. YMA Com. Member a ni tawh thin.
Kumin June thlaa a Jaundice atangin pancreas cancer, hrawk cancer, hepatitis B, lung leh zun kawng tha lo tih hmuhchhuah niin, Amri Hospital, Kolkata panpui a ni a. Aug thla-ah Bethesda Hospital leh September thla-ah Civil Hospital, Aizawlah enkawl a ni leh a. Oct. 20, 2013 Pathianni zingah Civil Hospital panpui leh niin, hemi ni zing dar 5:30 hian chatuan ram min lo pansan ta a ni. Hemi ni hian vui nghal a ni.

17th seed Fernandez hian quarterfinal-ah Martina Trevisan a hmachhawn leh dawn a, Trevisan hian quarterfinal a thlen vawi hnihna ni turin Aliaksandra Sasnovich chu 7-6 (12-10), 7-5-in a hneh ve bawk a ni.

MULCO General Meeting nei
Mizoram Milk Producers' Cooperation Union Limited (MULCO) Annual General Meeting vawi 26-na chu nimin khan Aizawl Bawngkawn South YMA Cultural Centre-ah neih a ni a, he hun hi Cooperation Minister C. Lalrinsanga chuan hmanpuiin Bawngvulh hi eizawnna tlaka siam kan tumna kawngah ramin hmasawnna tur tam tak a la nei tih a sawi a, chungte chu bawhzui turin theihtawp chhuah a ni zel a ni tih a sawi bawk. MULCO hi AH & Vety Department hmalakna in Janury 5, 1983 khan din a ni a, MULCO hi Cooperative Act hnuaiah mahni a ro inrel (Autonomous body) niin Mizoram pum huap tura duan a ni a, March 21, 1995 atang khan AH & Vety Department atanga indangin, Affiliated Society 530-ah Member 74 an awm a, MULCO hnuaia member te bawng vulh chu a vaiin 480 a ni.

Kum 2020 zet chu hripui vangin mitin mai nunphung leh khawsak a tibuai hneh hle a, eizawnna kawnga hnathawhna thlengin harsatna namen lo a siam phah a ni.
Kavie tia koh hi a zirna ah chuan a sang hle a mitam tak ngaihah pawh hetiang thil zuar tur a rin a nilo. Mahsela hun tawnin a zir miau si loh chuan a zawrh ve ngei a tul. Kavie hian a eizawn dan ah hian sawiselna leh zahna reng a neih phah chuang lo. Hei hi a chanchin lo hre tu tam tak ten an fak em em chhan chu a ni.
Amah hi UNITEN atang Mechanical Engineering ah degree a nei a, mahsela hripui leng Covid19 vangin engineering hna hi a zawm thei ta lo. Engineering hna nei thei lo mahse a hnual phah chuang lo a Brickfields a khawlai ah chuan Cycle hmanga inkhalhchhuak in thingpui Masala tea a lo zuar ta thin.
Hetia khawlai a thirsakawr khalh chunga thil zawrh hi India ram atanga a hriat ve tho a ni nghe nghe. Nitin tlai lam 3-5pm ah chuan a inzuarchhuak thin a,nikhat ah no 200 te alo hralhchhuak a ni.
Facebook group pakhat UnderMYPayung kaltlangin mi pakhat Jack Tan chuan a chanchin hi a tarlang. He group hi tun hripui len laia eizawnna lian lutuk lo siam te dawmkanna tur a tih a ni. Jack Tan hian dar 3-5pm inkar ah kher ngati nge a inzawrh tih a zawh chuan hetiang hun ah hian miten thingpui an in duh hun a nih thin thu in a lo chhang.
Zirsan satliah ve ringawt a, hna hniam leh sang a buai tlat ching thin ai chuan zirsang tho a hna eng pawh thawh hreh nei lo te hi an fakawm in an entawn tlak hle a ni.

Vawiin khan Champhai Forest Division buatsaihin Mother Teresa pianchamphaphak 108-na hriatrengnan DFO Office ramchhung, Bethel Veng, Champhaiah thingphun hnatlang neih a ni a. He hun hi Champhai North bialtu MLA Pu TT Zothansanga chuan a hmanpui a, he ni pual hian thing a phun a ni.
Pu TT Zothansanga chuan Mother Teresa chu hmangaihnaa khat, thliar bik awmloa a mihringpuite rawngbawlsaktu leh a nun puma mite tanpui thintu anih thu a sawi a. Mother Teresa chu khawvel miropui berte zinga mi, chawimawina hrang hrang pawh lo dawng tawh leh India rama sakhaw dang betute pawhin an ngaihsan rawn a ni, a ti a. A thil tih avangin Roman Catholic pawhin mi thianghlimah a puanga, khawvel awm chhungin a hming a dai ngai tawh dawn loh thu a sawi a. Forest and Climate Change Department bengvarnaa a mah hriatrengnana Forest Division hrang hranga thingphun hnatlang buatsaih a ni chu lawmawm a tih thu a sawi bawk a ni.
He hunah hian Pu C. Lalhnunpuia, Honorary Wildlife Warden; Pu C.Lalbiaka IFS, DFO Champhai Forest Division; Dr. Lallawmkima, DIPRO Champhai leh midangte’n he ni pual hian thing tiak an phun a. Champhai Forest Division Office, Champhaia thawkten Office leh a chhehvel tifaiin hnatlang an nei chhunzawm nghal a ni.
Mother Teresa hi Kum 1910, August Ni 26 khan Skopje, Macedonia-ah a pianga, kumin August Ni 26 hi Pathianni anih avangin vawiin lamah a pianchamphaphak 108-na pualin thingphun hnatlang hi buatsaih a ni.

Bru Coordination Committee (BCC) in Tripura-a Tuikuk raltlan nia insawi te chhiarpui a neih tawh, dikhlel a awm avanga siamthat leh chu Pathianni khan zawhfel a ni ta a, chhiar hmasak aia a punna chu 4439 zet a ni.
BCC-in Tuikuk raltlan nia insawi chhiarpui a neih zawhfel takah hian Tripura-a refugee camp 6-a Tuikuk khawsa zat chu an vaiin mi 31,700 niin an insawi a. Kum 1997-a buaina chhuakaTripura pana tlan-chhia te chu chhungkaw 5,448-ah mi 29,520 awmin; 2009 November thlaa Bungthuam tlangval thihna kaihhnawih buaina chhuak avanga tlanchhia nia insawi chhungkaw 449-ah mi 2,183 an awm nia sawi a ni bawk.
Tripura refugee camp-a Tuikuk raltlan nia insawite chhiarpui hi Mizoram sorkar ruahmannaa neih a ni a, chhiarpui neihna tur hmanrua (profoma) te Tripura sorkar kaltlangin BCC hnenah hian hlan a ni a, BCC hian chhiarpui hi an lo buaipui thung a ni.

Aliamcia march ni 2,2021 ah khan ASEAN ram hna nih, ralkap pawl hna cu Daw Aung San Suu Kyi thlah dingin nawlnak an rak tuah cang. Asinain atu tiang an thlah duh lo. Tutan ah Singapore ramdang vuanci a khualtlawnnak ah hin Kawlram caah theipar ttha chuak hram ko sehlaw a tthatuk hnga.
